actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize a project for bank erosion control on the Rillito River in the vicinity of Tucson Arizona.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to undertake a bank erosion project on the Rillito River near Tucson, Arizona, for flood control purposes. Directs the Secretary to include certain bank erosion control work carried out by non-Federal interests after January 1, 1985, as part of the non-Federal contribution for such project.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a project for bank erosion control on the Rillito River in the vicinity of Tucson Arizona.
